answerText: [Federal Republic of] Nigeria[10] Naguib Mahfouz hails from this capital city. He included Palace Walk, Palace of Desire, and Sugar Street in his trilogy depicting life in this city.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 9 | 20 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Name some African locales based on their literary output,  [10] Sidi marries Baroka in The Lion and the Jewel, a play by Wole Soyinka, an author from this country.
